tasks.build-all: deno compile --allow-env --allow-read --target x86_64-apple-darwin -o bin/readerize-x86_64-apple-darwin readerize.js && deno compile --allow-env --allow-read --target aarch64-apple-darwin -o bin/readerize-aarch64-apple-darwin readerize.js && deno compile --allow-env --allow-read --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu -o bin/readerize-aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu readerize.js && deno compile --allow-env --allow-read --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -o bin/readerize-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu  readerize.js && deno compile --allow-env --allow-read --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc -o bin/readerize-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe readerize.js
